授業目的:
I am always happy to meet students to discuss their
academic needs and concerns, for example by giving advice on the interpretation
of a literary text, providing a reference for study abroad, or by studying a
text together.
到達目標:
Objectives will be agreed at the beginning of the
learning period.
授業方法:
Individual sessions for reading and discussion in
my office.

トピック.授業計画1: A programme of study and instruction will be arranged according to student requirements.
トピック.授業外学習2: As agreed.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
